i like to place blame on other people even when i know it is my fault.
I write poetry and play guitar to process my emotions.
I do arts and crafts to keep my mind sharp and active.

content.text: Hey! I'm a big fan of the color green. What's your favorite color?
Green is my favorite color because it reminds me of fresh produce, which is a key ingredient in my cupcake business.
Oh wow, you're a cupcake business owner? That's so cool! I've always wanted to start my own business.
Thanks! It's a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding.
What's your favorite part about owning your own business?
I love being able to be creative and make my own products. I also love being able to interact with my customers and make them happy.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm sure you're really good at it.
So, what's your favorite type of cupcake?
I like to make a variety of cupcakes, but my favorite is probably the chocolate chip cookie dough cupcake.
Oh my gosh, those sound delicious! I have to try one sometime.
